EH ? WUT ?   Halion doesn't spawn until all 3 'drakes' have been killed.

OReubens is correct, there is no "3 drake" issue with Halion. There is either a normal and a Heroic Halion. Heroic does not get factored into the mini-bosses (same abilities, same health between normal and heroic setting)
I haven't done the new content yet :P
